resources.string: Use the textbox below to enter a hostname for this device.\n\nMake sure it has no special characters and contains no spaces.
Change the hostname of your device as it appears on networks. Useful for managing and identifying multiple devices on a WLAN.
The hostname may only contain letters (a–zA–Z), numbers (0–9) and . or – as per a proper hostname.\n\nIt cannot contain any special characters or spaces and must be shorter than 255 characters.
